Package com.chatapp.models

Class ChatRoom

java.lang.Object
com.chatapp.models.ChatRoom
public class ChatRoom extends Object
Represents a chat room within the Chat Application, responsible for managing participants, storing chat history, and facilitating message communication between users.

The chat room ensures messages are encrypted using a Caesar Cipher technique for added security. Additionally, it supports functionalities to save chat histories to a file and load them back, providing persistence of chat interactions across sessions.

Author:
Prutha Upadhyay

  • Method Details

    • getChatRoomId

      public int getChatRoomId()
      Retrieves the unique ID of this chat room.
      Returns:
      the ID of this chat room.

    • getParticipants

      public List<RegisterUser> getParticipants()
      Retrieves a list of participants present in the chat room. The list is unmodifiable.
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of RegisterUser participants.

    • getChatHistory

      public List<String> getChatHistory()
      Retrieves the chat history of the room. The list is unmodifiable.
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list of chat messages.

    • addParticipant

      public void addParticipant(RegisterUser user)
      Adds a participant to the chat room.
      Parameters:
      user - The RegisterUser to be added.

    • removeParticipant

      public void removeParticipant(RegisterUser user)
      Removes a participant from the chat room.
      Parameters:
      user - The RegisterUser to be removed.

    • sendMessage

      public String sendMessage(RegisterUser sender, String message)
      Sends an encrypted message to the chat room. The message is first encrypted using Caesar Cipher, then added to the chat history and finally displayed to all participants of the chat room.
      Parameters:
      sender - The user sending the message.
      message - The plaintext message content.
      Returns:
      The encrypted version of the sent message.

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage(RegisterUser receiver, String message)
      Processes a received message in the chat room by decrypting it. The decrypted message is then added to the chat history and displayed to all participants.
      Parameters:
      receiver - The user receiving the message.
      message - The encrypted message content.

    • saveChatHistoryToFile

      public boolean saveChatHistoryToFile(String pathname)
      Attempts to persistently save the chat room's history to a specified file. Each message is written on a new line in the file.
      Parameters:
      pathname - The destination path and filename for the chat history.
      Returns:
      true if the chat history was successfully saved; false otherwise.

    • loadMessagesFromFile

      public boolean loadMessagesFromFile(String pathname)
      Attempts to load a chat room's history from a specified file. Each message in the file is added to the chat room's history and displayed to participants.
      Parameters:
      pathname - The source path and filename of the chat history to load.
      Returns:
      true if the chat history was successfully loaded; false otherwise.

    • getRoomName

      public String getRoomName()
      Retrieves the name of the chat room.
      Returns:
      the name of the chat room.

    • setRoomName

      public void setRoomName(String roomName)
      Sets or updates the name of the chat room.
      Parameters:
      roomName - The new name for the chat room.
